text: @narendramodi Modi like anyother Tyrant is afraid. He is afraid of Coronavirus, he is afraid when time will catch up with him. All Tyrants eventually see a dreadful end. All Tyrants are eventually dishonored. @narendramodi @PMOIndia @rashtrapatibhvn @RahulGandhi
